title: Insurance Inquiry Website with Admin Dashboard

requirements.text: Create a multi-type insurance inquiry and quote request form supporting Health, Auto, Life, and Home insurance. Each insurance type should have relevant fields (e.g., age, coverage amount, vehicle info, property details). Users should be able to submit the form, and submissions must be saved in the backend with a timestamp, insurance type, and all form fields.

quotes: Multi-type insurance inquiry/quote request form (health, auto, life, home)

acceptanceCriteria: User can select from Health, Auto, Life, or Home insurance types
Form fields change dynamically based on selected insurance type
All required fields are validated before submission
Submitted inquiry is saved in the backend with timestamp, type, and all fields
User sees a success confirmation message after submitting

requirements.text: Create a Browse Insurance Plans page that displays available plans for each insurance type (Health, Auto, Life, Home). Each plan card should show plan name, key features/coverage highlights, and a call-to-action button to start an inquiry for that plan.
acceptanceCriteria: Plans are filterable or grouped by insurance type (Health, Auto, Life, Home)
Each plan card displays plan name, coverage highlights, and a CTA button
Clicking the CTA button pre-fills the inquiry form with the selected plan and insurance type
Plans data is stored in the backend and rendered on the frontend

requirements.text: Create a Contact an Agent section that displays agent contact information (name, specialization, phone, email) and includes a simple contact message form allowing users to send a message to an agent. Contact messages should be saved in the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Agent contact information is displayed (name, specialization, contact details)
Contact form includes fields for user name, email, subject, and message
Submitted contact messages are saved in the backend with timestamp
User sees a confirmation message after submitting the contact form

requirements.text: Create an Admin/Agent Dashboard page (accessible via a protected route) that lists all submitted insurance inquiries and contact messages. The dashboard should allow filtering by insurance type and inquiry status, and allow the admin to update the status of an inquiry (e.g., Pending, In Review, Resolved).

quotes: Admin/agent dashboard to view and manage saved inquiries

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays all submitted inquiries with key details (name, type, date, status)
Dashboard displays all contact messages
Admin can filter inquiries by insurance type and status
Admin can click an inquiry to view full details
Admin can update the status of an inquiry (Pending, In Review, Resolved)
Status updates are persisted in the backend

requirements.text: Apply a professional, trustworthy visual theme across the entire site. Use a clean, modern design with a warm neutral and deep teal color palette, clear sans-serif typography, and a layout that conveys reliability and professionalism. Include a navigation bar with links to all main pages (Home, Plans, Contact, Admin) and a footer with basic site info.
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette and typography applied across all pages
Navigation bar links to Home, Plans, Contact, and Admin Dashboard
Footer is present on all pages
Layout is responsive and usable on mobile and desktop

constraints: All backend logic must reside in a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
Do not integrate external email or SMS services for notifications
Admin access should be handled with a simple client-side route guard, no external auth provider
nonGoals: Real-time chat or live agent messaging
Integration with external insurance provider APIs

required: Professional insurance hero banner with abstract shapes representing protection and security, warm neutral tones with deep teal accents (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Insurance type icon set showing health heart-cross, auto car, life shield-person, home house in flat modern teal style (insurance-icons.dim_512x128.png)
